articles.author: Clea Caulcutt, Laura Kayali, Nicholas Vinocur
articles.title: Europe gets warm words from US on Ukraine — but reliability fears loom - politico.eu
articles.description: An explicit commitment that Washington would backstop Kyiv was scrapped in the leaders’ final joint statement.

articles.title: US may seize oil tanker heading for Europe, reports say - BBC
articles.description: US officials have a warrant to seize the Russian-flagged ship accused of breaking sanctions.
articles.content:
Kayleen Devlin,BBC Verify senior journalist
The US may act to seize a Russian-flagged oil tanker heading across the Atlantic to Europe, CBS News, the BBC's media partner in the US, reported.
